projects.name: Blog App
projects.description: Built a blog application using Django where users can create, edit, and delete posts. Implemented user authentication and authorization using Djangos built-in features.

projects.name: Code Crafters
projects.description: Develop a news application using Node serving a REST API with React as the frontend. featuring secure authentication via JSON Web Tokens and Google OAuth strengthened by BcryptJs encryption. State management was optimized with Redux Toolkit and persisted across sessions.

projects.name: Nexablend
projects.description: Developed an E-Commerce platform with payment gateways, authentication and authorization. created an admin module, and essential features like pagination, filtering, product rating, reviews, and checkout. Deployed the application seamlessly, ensuring reliability and customer satisfaction.

projects.name: Communi
projects.description: Engineered a MERN chat app featuring real-time messaging, notifications, and secure authentication. Praised for its intuitive UX, routing, and responsive design.

experiences.description: Create a user-friendly platform allowing pet enthusiasts to explore and purchase pets so reduce manual 50%. Users can log in securely using their email and password. view a list of available pets with details, and initiate the purchase by filling out an order form speed up by 20%.

Developed responsive UI components using HTML, CSS, and Reactjs, ensuring seamless user interactions and meeting project milestones under senior developers guidance lowering the companys cost by 20%. Contributed to Nodejs-based back-end tasks, assisting in API development, database management, and code optimization enhance system efficiency.

full_output.name: Yash Jain
achievements_and_awards: Hackathon: Recognized by the Government of India as a Smart India Hackathon finalist with over 24,400 teams.
Olympiad: Recognized as a Hindustan Olympiad Gold Medalist alongside actor Mr.Razza Murad, among 11 lakh participants nationwide.
UP Genius Award Gold Medalist out of 25,000.
Science Innovation: National Children Science Congress State Winner.
